domain.squares

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.squares.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains most of the knowledge about squares including properties, jail, chance, community chest and various others
    Author:
    AngryNerds

        public Square(java.lang.String string,
              int i,
              int j,

              int lev0,
              int lev1,
              int lev2,
              int lev3,
              int lev4,
              int lev5,
              int lev6)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        string - name of square
        i - index of square
        j - price of square
        color - color of square
        lev0 - default rent amount
        lev1 - rent with 1 house
        lev2 - rent with 2 houses
        lev3 - rent with 3 houses
        lev4 - rent with 4 houses
        lev5 - rent with hotel
        lev6 - rent with skyscraper
